title: Verb collection 2
sentences: Unfortunately, I don't understand this sentence.
When does the movie in the cinema begin?
I am looking for my blue pen.
We are visiting our friends on the weekend.
Have you already signed the document?
I will bring the book along for you tomorrow.
When are we paying the bill?
I believe that it will still rain today.
Can you please repeat the question?
I know this city very well.
We are currently planning our next vacation.
I hope that you get well soon.
When are you explaining the new rules to us?
lieber einen Tee als einen Kaffee.
I'll take a tea rather than a coffee.
We are ordering a pizza for everyone.
Can you please close the door?
I am comparing the prices on the internet.
We are expecting an important guest today.
I will decide on a car tomorrow.
I will tell you the whole story later.
We are trying to solve the problem.
I promise you that I will be on time.
When are you delivering the furniture?
I avoid sugar in my tea.
uns die Kosten für die Reise.
We share the costs for the trip.
I recommend this restaurant to you.
Can you show me the way?
dictionary:
helfen - to help
verstehen - to understand
beginnen - to begin
suchen - to look for
besuchen - to visit
unterschreiben - to sign
bringen - to bring
bezahlen - to pay
glauben - to believe / think
wiederholen - to repeat
kenne / kennen - to know (person/place)
planen - to plan
hoffen - to hope
erklären - to explain
nehme / nehmen - to take
bestellen - to order
verliere / verlieren - to lose
schließen - to close
vergleiche / vergleichen - to compare
erwarten - to expect
entscheiden - to decide
bestätigen - to confirm
erzähle / erzählen - to tell (a story)
versuchen - to try
versprechen - to promise
liefern - to deliver
vermeide / vermeiden - to avoid
teilen - to share
empfehle / empfehlen - to recommend
zeigen - to show
